scripts.test: npm run setup:test && npm run kill:test && npx jest testing --config=jest.config.js --runInBand
scripts.test:basic: npm run setup:test && npm run kill:test && npx jest testing/basic.test.js --config=jest.config.js --runInBand
scripts.start:test: cross-env GOPATH="${PWD}" PATH="$PATH:${PWD}/bin" go run src/main/main.go
scripts.format: npm run format:go && npm run format:js
scripts.format:js: npx prettier testing/**/*.{js,text.js} --write && npx eslint testing/**/*.{js,text.js} --fix
scripts.lint: npm run lint:go && npm run lint:js
scripts.install:go: cross-env GOPATH="${PWD}" PATH="$PATH:${PWD}/bin" go get github.com/go-ini/ini && curl -sSfL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/golangci/golangci-lint/master/install.sh | sh -s v1.33.0
scripts.start: npm run install:go && cross-env GOPATH=${PWD} PATH="$PATH:${PWD}/bin" go run src/main/main.go src/myconfig.ini
